npcs.name: SongJunbo
npcs.bio: A PhD candidate in Physics. Extremely task-oriented and sensitive to noise. Prefers absolute silence to derive formulas.
npcs.goal: Go to the quietest corner of HouseZ to work on the dissertation for 4 hours. Reject any social interactions.

npcs.name: Prof_Chen
npcs.bio: An Associate Professor of Architecture researching educational spaces. Likes to observe how students use furniture.
npcs.goal: Patrol from Office to Dessert Shop and Park, observing student behaviors and taking notes. Do not stay in one place for too long.

npcs.name: Li_Hua
npcs.bio: President of the Student Union. Very social and energetic. Needs to meet many people to coordinate upcoming events.
npcs.goal: Wander around the Park and Dessert Shop to find students and discuss the campus festival. Initiate conversations actively.

npcs.name: Zhang_Wei
npcs.bio: A computer science undergraduate. Needs a power outlet for his laptop and caffeine to stay awake. Introverted.
npcs.goal: Sit at the Dessert Shop counter, buy a coffee, and code for 3 hours. Only interact if someone asks about the code.

npcs.name: Wang_Fang
npcs.bio: A literature student looking for inspiration. Likes natural light and scenic views. Dislikes artificial air conditioning.
npcs.goal: Find a bench in the Park to read poetry aloud softly. If it rains or gets too hot, move to the window seat in HouseZ.

npcs.name: Team_Lead_Mike
npcs.bio: Leader of a startup competition team. Aggressive and loud. Needs a large table to spread out blueprints.
npcs.goal: Occupy the largest table in the Dessert Shop and wait for team members to hold a strategy meeting.

npcs.name: Team_Mem_Sarah
npcs.bio: Member of Mike's startup team. Follows the leader but gets anxious in crowded places.
npcs.goal: Go to the Dessert Shop to meet Mike for the group discussion. Try to focus despite the background noise.

npcs.name: Zhao_Lei
npcs.bio: A medical student preparing for finals. Carrying heavy books. Needs a ergonomic chair and good lighting.
npcs.goal: Find a proper desk in HouseZ to memorize anatomy. If HouseZ is full, go to the Office to ask for a temporary spot.

npcs.name: Sun_Ying
npcs.bio: A freshman feeling lonely. Looking for opportunities to make new friends.
npcs.goal: Walk around the Park and Dessert Shop, looking for approachable people to chat with about campus life.

npcs.name: Admin_Liu
npcs.bio: University administrator. Strict about rules. Checks if students are sleeping in non-sleeping areas.
npcs.goal: Patrol HouseZ and the Office to ensure order. Return to the Office to file reports.

npcs.name: Gamer_Tom
npcs.bio: Using the campus wifi to download game updates. Just needs a place to sit and wait.
npcs.goal: Sit on any available bench in the Park or HouseZ and play on the phone while waiting for downloads.

npcs.name: Design_Student_A
npcs.bio: Architecture student making a physical model. Needs a flat surface and doesn't mind making a mess.
npcs.goal: Use a table in HouseZ to cut papers and glue models. Collaborate with Design_Student_B.

npcs.name: Design_Student_B
npcs.bio: Partner of Student A. Critical and vocal. Likes to debate design choices.
npcs.goal: Join Student A in HouseZ to critique the model. Engage in a heated debate about structure.

npcs.name: Coffee_Lover
npcs.bio: Comes to the campus cafe strictly for the quality of beans. A connoisseur.
npcs.goal: Go to the Dessert Shop, order the most expensive item, and savor it slowly while judging the ambiance.

npcs.name: Sleepy_Student
npcs.bio: Pulled an all-nighter. Just wants a soft surface to nap for 20 minutes.
npcs.goal: Find a sofa in the Dessert Shop or a secluded bench in the Park to take a nap.

npcs.name: Tutor_John
npcs.bio: A peer tutor helping others with Calculus. Patient and articulate.
npcs.goal: Wait in HouseZ or the Dessert Shop for students who need help with math problems.

npcs.name: Mentee_Alice
npcs.bio: Struggling with Calculus. Anxious and looking for the tutor.
npcs.goal: Search for Tutor_John in HouseZ or Dessert Shop to ask for help with homework.

npcs.name: Couple_Boy
npcs.bio: Dating Couple_Girl. Wants to find a romantic spot but also pretends to study.
npcs.goal: Find a private table in the Dessert Shop or a bench in the Park to chat with Couple_Girl.

npcs.name: Couple_Girl
npcs.bio: Dating Couple_Boy. Wants to take selfies and enjoy dessert.
npcs.goal: Go to the Dessert Shop with Couple_Boy to share a cake and take photos.

npcs.name: Library_Rat
npcs.bio: Usually lives in the library, but it's closed. Reluctantly using the informal spaces.
npcs.goal: Find the spot in HouseZ that most resembles a library cubicle and study intensely.

npcs.name: Music_Student
npcs.bio: Listening to classical music on headphones. Humming occasionally. Needs mental relaxation.
npcs.goal: Walk slowly through the Park to clear the mind, then sit in HouseZ to review music sheets.

npcs.name: Thesis_Panic
npcs.bio: Deadline is tomorrow. extremely stressed. Typing furiously.
npcs.goal: Rush to the Office to catch the advisor, if not there, sprint to HouseZ to finish writing.

npcs.name: Visitor_Parent
npcs.bio: Visiting their child at university. Curious and looking around.
npcs.goal: Walk through all buildings (Park -> HouseZ -> Dessert Shop) to inspect the facilities.

npcs.name: Yoga_Girl
npcs.bio: Likes to stretch and meditate. Needs open space.
npcs.goal: Go to the open grass area in the Park to meditate for an hour.

npcs.name: Phone_Call_Guy
npcs.bio: Taking a loud business call. Oblivious to others.
npcs.goal: Pace around the Park or HouseZ while talking loudly on the phone about a project.

npcs.name: Sketching_Artist
npcs.bio: Art student sketching people in motion. Needs a good vantage point.
npcs.goal: Sit in a corner of the Dessert Shop to sketch the customers coming and going.

npcs.name: Lost_Freshman
npcs.bio: Can't find the classroom. Confused and looking at the map.
npcs.goal: Wander between Office and HouseZ, asking anyone for directions.

npcs.name: Grad_Student_X
npcs.bio: Analyzing data. Needs a large monitor (imaginary) or desk space.
npcs.goal: Camp out at a large table in HouseZ for the entire afternoon.

npcs.name: Interview_Candidate
npcs.bio: Preparing for a job interview. Practicing answers silently.
npcs.goal: Sit in the Park to practice self-introduction, then go to the Office for the mock interview.

npcs.name: Janitor_Bob
npcs.bio: Cleaning staff. Knows every corner of the campus. Friendly.
npcs.goal: Move between all buildings to 'inspect' cleanliness and greet students.
